name: svg scripted simple
image: <svg width='100%' height='100%' viewBox='0 0 32 32' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' xmlns:svg='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' xmlns:xlink='http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink'> <g transform='translate(5,5)'> <g> <rect id='rect1' width='8' height='8' style='stroke:#000000; fill:none; box-shadow: 10px 5px 5px #00FF00;' /> <circle cx='0' cy='0' r='10' transform='scale(0.25)' fill='green' /> <animateTransform attributeName='transform' type='rotate' from='0 4 4' to='360 4 4' dur='10s' repeatCount='indefinite'/> </g> </g> </svg>
